title: Decoration space

properties.value: Decoration space is a hotspot in the Dining Room, Combat Room, Oubliette, Throne room, Dungeon, and Treasure Room of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

SMW Subobject for Decoration space 1Image: File:Decoration space 1.pngObject ID: 15259, 15297, 15303, 15341, 15433, 15434Uses infobox: SceneryIs members only: trueIs variant of: Decoration space

Decoration space is a hotspot in the Dining Room, Combat Room, Oubliette, Throne room, Dungeon, and Treasure Room of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

Contents

  • 1 Dining Room, Combat Room, Throne Room, and Treasure Room
    • 1.1 Creation Menu
  • 2 Oubliette, Dungeon, and Treasure Room
    • 2.1 Creation Menu

Dining Room, Combat Room, Throne Room, and Treasure Room[edit | edit source]

Creation Menu[edit | edit source]

Key[c 1] Level Decoration Materials Experience Cost
1 16[c 2] Oak wall decoration Oak plank x2 120 944
2 36[c 2] Teak wall decoration Teak plank x2 180 1,892
3 56[c 2] Gilded decoration Mahogany plank x3
Gold leaf x2 		1,020 275,240
4 66[c 3] Round shield Oak plank x2 120 944
5 76[c 3] Square shield Teak plank x4 360 3,784
6 86[c 3] Kite shield Mahogany plank x3 420 6,612
  1. ↑ Press this key on your keyboard while in the Creation Menu to build this item.
  2. ↑ 2.0 2.1 2.2 Only buildable in the Dining Room, Combat Room, and Throne Room.
  3. ↑ 3.0 3.1 3.2 Only buildable in the Throne Room and Treasure Room.
